name: OCKAnyPatientStore
desc: A custom store that performs read/write operations on a patient data type.

items.name: func addAnyPatient(OCKAnyPatient, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyPatient>?)
items.desc: Adds a patient asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addAnyPatients([OCKAnyPatient], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyPatient]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of patients asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateAnyPatient(OCKAnyPatient, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyPatient>?)
items.desc: Updates a patient asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateAnyPatients([OCKAnyPatient], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyPatient]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of patients asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyPatient(OCKAnyPatient, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyPatient>?)
items.desc: Deletes a patient asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyPatients([OCKAnyPatient], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyPatient]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of patients asynchronously from the store.
